attributes.action: benifits and changes for the better
attributes.additional_details:
These I believe are a few options to be discussed regarding the future of the benifits system in the UK.

1 - No benifits for youths who have failed or left school without qualifications.

2 - No benifit for youths until completion of one years training or employment.

3 - Cash benifits for not working to be replaced by food and clothing vouchers. this to be done in accordance with the NHS as drugs testing to be done and in conjuntion with major food and clothing chains to stop the selling of these vouchers for cash or drugs.

4 - Government to carry out community surgeries outwith working hours so working people in this country can have a say in our benifits. No More giving our money away. 5 pound less to a drug user or long term non worker means a better future for us all.

Please see fit to sign this petition and help change this country for the better we all depend on change.
